column1: NYC Metro Area CPI-U Inflation by Fiscal Year
Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
Series: CPI-U All Items, New York-Newark-Jersey City, NY-NJ-PA (1982-84=100)
BLS Series ID: CUURS12ASA0 (also known as CUURA101SA0 on FRED)
Fiscal Year runs July 1 through June 30 (e.g., FY2025 = July 2024 - June 2025)
Average CPI is the simple average of 12 monthly index values within each fiscal year
Inflation % = year-over-year change in the fiscal year average CPI
Note: October 2025 data not available due to 2025 lapse in appropriations (government shutdown)
